message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you my product for $15000. It's a unique piece and I believe it will be worth your investment. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I'm looking to save some money, but I'm still willing to make a fair offer.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $13500. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. What do you say?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $13500 is a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $13000. This is a fair price that I'm willing to pay for the product.
